title: Can someone please id this script
content:
Hi everyone,

Does anyone know which script they are using for the window type....could be the good ol' custom writing with a brush/marker...but i'm asking just in case.

In case it is a custom job do you guys know of any similar looking alternatives that come "really" close?

All help is appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030423im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cass-NW3-0048_4807.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030423im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cass-NW3-0034_5133.jpg)
author: Evie

comments.content:
A custom job, "handwritten vinyls designed by Marion Deuchars":  
 [http://new.pentagram.com/2010/08/cass-art-opens-fifth-store/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030423/http:/new.pentagram.com/2010/08/cass-art-opens-fifth-store/ "http://new.pentagram.com/2010/08/cass-art-opens-fifth-store/")  
 [http://www.mariondeuchars.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030423/http:/www.mariondeuchars.com/ "http://www.mariondeuchars.com/")

For typefaces that may help you capture the same feel, check out this discussion:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/118148](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030423/http:/typophile.com/node/118148 "http://typophile.com/node/118148")

A few more options from UK foundry The Northern Block:

[http://www.thenorthernblock.co.uk/fonts/finlek/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030423/http:/www.thenorthernblock.co.uk/fonts/finlek/ "http://www.thenorthernblock.co.uk/fonts/finlek/")  
 [http://www.thenorthernblock.co.uk/fonts/qiber/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030423/http:/www.thenorthernblock.co.uk/fonts/qiber/ "http://www.thenorthernblock.co.uk/fonts/qiber/")  
 [http://www.thenorthernblock.co.uk/fonts/velik/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030423/http:/www.thenorthernblock.co.uk/fonts/velik/ "http://www.thenorthernblock.co.uk/fonts/velik/")
Riccardo, Liebe Doris would be perfect for recreating the look of the uppercase calligraphy in the sample.
